footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Venti | Update Date: 08/07/2022 | Editor: Effab1e#2963

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Elegy for the End__ - Provides good buffs and more than sufficient ER for Venti. Generally always recommended to use.

__The Stringless__ - Strongest option for Venti's personal damage, provides much appreciated EM.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon:
fields.value:
__Windblume Ode__ - Similar to Stringless R1, best non gacha option.

__Favonius Warbow__ - Not strong for damage, only worth using if team needs a lot of energy particles.

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> Elemental Mastery |<goblet>  Elemental Mastery |<circlet>  Elemental Mastery

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Burst: Wind's Grand Ode
**2)** Elemental Skill: Skyward Sonnet
**3)** Normal Attack: Divine Marksmanship

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
__For EM Venti getting him to level 90 is suggested over talents__.

While ATK%/Anemo/CRIT is a possible build for venti it generally requires extremely high investment to barely surpass the standard EM build in multi target (which is Venti's niche), EM build is also better when Venti is triggering chain reactions.

ER Requirements:
1 Skill between burst - 200%
2 Skills used - 160 to 170%
Double Anemo - 120-130%
